code:
%% Connection flowchart
flowchart TD
  subgraph Client[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
    C1[CloudNative_DockerImage]
    C2[CloudNative_Serverless]
    C3[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
    C4[CloudNative_HelmChart]
    C5[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
  end

  subgraph Server[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
    S1[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
    S2{CloudNative_K8sCluster}
    S3[CloudNative_HelmChart]
    S4[CloudNative_DockerImage]
    S5[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
    S6[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
  end

  C1 --> C2 --> C3 --> S1
  S1 -->|invalid| Drop[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
  S1 --> S2
  S2 -- yes --> S3 --> S4 --> C5
  S2 -- no --> S5

  C5 -- piggyback --> S1
  C5 -- no_outgoing --> ExplicitACK[CloudNative_K8sCluster] --> S1
  C4 --> C3

  S6 --> Close[CloudNative_DockerImage]
